title: Cartoons > Gun Control, Marco Can’t Quit The NRA 2.22.18

description:
In episode 90, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Shannon Coffey to discuss Florida's town hall meeting on gun control, NRA's Eddie the Eagle, the Windsor Hum, US Women's Hockey team, new Peeps flavors, Quincy Jones apology, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
